column5: This unique home in the arboretum area is in a quiet neighborhood and a few minutes from restaurants, grocery stores, and easy freeway access. Spacious with 4 bedrooms (1 king, 2 queens and 1 single), 2 couches, futon matress and 3 bath. Pool and hot tub. Close to freeways, restaurants and grocery stores. Usually a 20 minute drive to downtown. For business travelers, we are 5 minutes from the Renaissance at the Arboretum, and a short drive from most tech companies in northwest Austin.
